name: Série Noire
overview: In the guise of a classic adventure game duo, Série Noire has the advantage of bringing together up to six participants in a common adventure. You take turns establishing the contract that you must fulfill to emerge victorious from this quest. Among your five companions, there is one that you must kill, another that you must steal, the third having the right to your passionate kisses ... In a strange dwelling strewn with traps and pitfalls , our six detectives face each other in the greatest uncertainty. On each game turn, only people in the same room are allowed to watch the screen. In view of the reactions of your partners, you identify the purpose of each. The action is then coupled with an astonishing climate of suspicion where alliances are more than ephemeral! If it is indeed important to preserve its own existence, the many puzzles encountered in each room will only increase the difficulty of your maneuvers. A software to load only in the presence of his best friends!
